profile_summary:
As a proficient Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in delivering high-performance applications utilizing **Ruby**, **TypeScript**, **React**, and **Docker**. My technical expertise includes strong knowledge in API integration and cloud services, particularly with **AWS CDK**. I have a solid background in database management with **Postgres** and **Redis**, ensuring efficient data handling in developed applications.
I have successfully contributed to enterprise projects that require stringent compliance standards, demonstrating my knowledge in cybersecurity practices. My experience also extends to full-stack development, covering both front-end and back-end frameworks, as well as applying best practices in software engineering. My foundational skills in automation and infrastructure management, paired with my strong commitment to building secure and scalable applications, enable me to deliver solutions that meet both user needs and business objectives.
